chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), Grobner A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec L -> forall p : poly A0 eqA ltM, Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p L -> zerop A A0 eqA n ltM p \/ (exists q : poly A0 eqA ltM, reducep L p q)

Premises:
Cb : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop
zerop : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), poly A0 eqA ltM -> Prop
poly : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Set
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (?m + n0) where ?m : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec
Grobner : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop

reducep = fun (L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) (p q : poly A0 eqA ltM) => reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec L (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM p) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM q) : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> Prop Arguments reducep _%list_scope

```coq
Require Import Coq.Lists.List.

Inductive genPcP (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n)) : Prop :=
| genPcP0 : forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q
| genPcP1 : forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q)
| genPcP2 : forall (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (reducep L p q :: Q)
.

Goal forall L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p : poly A0 eqA ltM, Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec L -> zerop A A0 eqA n ltM p \/ (exists q : poly A0 eqA ltM, reducep L p q).
Proof.
intros L p CbL H.
unfold Cb in CbL.
induction L as [|a L' IH].
- simpl. destruct p; auto.
- simpl. destruct p; auto.
  specialize (IH _ (reducep L a p)).
  apply IH.
Qed.
```

original: Require Import Coq.Lists.List. Inductive genPcP (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) (cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n)) : Prop := | genPcP0 : forall (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q | genPcP1 : forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (a :: Q) | genPcP2 : forall (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), genPcP A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (reducep L p q :: Q) .
